title: Charlize Theron serves mod vibes in retro mini dress with John Lithgow at Bombshell screening in NYC
text:
Charlize Theron has taken on one of the most controversial rolls of her life with her new film Bombshell (and she played a serial killer in Monster).

She stars as Megyn Kelly in the upcoming movie, which comes to theaters December 20.

The actress served a retro mod chic look Sunday for a screening at the Crosby Street Hotel in New York City.

Mod chic: Charlize Theron served a retro mod chic look Sunday for a Bombshell screening at the Crosby Street Hotel in New York City

She arrived in a black mini dress with mid-length sleeves and a white geometric print.

Theron completed the '60s motif with a pair of pointed knee-length black stiletto boots.

She sported her chic bowl cut, showing off a petite pair of diamond teardrop earrings.

The 44-year-old was accompanied at the screening by John Lithgow, who plays Roger Ailes in the movie.

Lithgow cut a sharp look in a tailored black suit, paired with a navy blue shirt, a black belt and matching leather dress shoes.

They were joined by screenwriter Charles Randolph, co-star Brigette Lundy-Paine and director Jay Roach.

Also present at the event was Gayle King, who chatted with Theron before the screening.
